reason.description: A machine-readable description of why this operation is in the "Failure" status. If this value is empty there is no information available.

template.description: template is the PodTemplateSpec after the defaulting is applied.

allowedBy.description: allowedBy is a reference to the rule that allows the PodTemplateSpec. A rule can be a SecurityContextConstraint or a PodSecurityPolicy A `nil`, indicates that it was denied.
